item.title: Trump admin updates: DOGE forces its way into US Institute for Peace
item.description: DOGE staffers entered the independent nonprofit U.S. Institute for Peace (USIP) on Monday night.

item.title: High-stakes Trump call with Putin expected in 2-hour window, Kremlin says

item.title: WATCH: Who invented the March Madness bracket? A debate rages
item.description: The concept of filling out a bracket with your picks for the NCAA tournament may have started at a bar in Staten Island, New York.
